# Testing owl:InverseFunctionalProperty (prp-ifp)

PREFIX bbc:<http://www.bbc.co.uk/ontologies/bbc/>  
PREFIX rdf:<http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> 
PREFIX owl:<http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
PREFIX rdfs:<http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
PREFIX xsd:<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> 
PREFIX core:<http://www.bbc.co.uk/ontologies/coreconcepts/> 
PREFIX cwork:<http://www.bbc.co.uk/ontologies/creativework/> 
PREFIX ldbc:<http://www.ldbc.eu/ontologies/sempub#>

INSERT DATA 
{
 <http://www.bbc.co.uk/things/thing-prp-ifp-1#id> core:disambiguationHint
	"disambiguationHint for http://www.bbc.co.uk/things/thing-prp-ifp-1-2#id"; 
       rdfs:comment "Testing owl:InverseFunctionalProperty" ;
	rdfs:label "label for http://www.bbc.co.uk/things/thing-prp-ifp-1#id" . 

 <http://www.bbc.co.uk/things/thing-prp-ifp-2#id> core:disambiguationHint
	"disambiguationHint for http://www.bbc.co.uk/things/thing-prp-ifp-1-2#id"; 
       rdfs:comment "Testing owl:InverseFunctionalProperty" . 
}
